law.catch_line: (Repealed effective October 1, 2012) Uniformity of application and construction; short title.
law.text:
This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.
The provisions of the chapter may be cited as the "Virginia Uniform Transfers to Minors Act."
